attributes.action: make prisons less like a holiday camp
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we have to fight for the right to turn prisons into prisons by ridding all the luxury items (TV's ect)and making more prisoners fit into smaller cells to increase the amount of prisoners to fit into 1 prison

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
